attributes.action: give us the referendum on Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
give us back our freedoms,
give us the referendum on Europe as agreed,
give us a general election now, and not when it is forced upon you next year.
Give the people what they want!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
